page.title: 13HOUSING
page.content: In{North Baddesley}there are shops,flats,houses and schools.When the{Domesday Book}was written North Baddesley was a small village with 91 people in it.There are at least 1,360 houses and 12 blocks of flats.The total number of flats is 58.North Baddesley has a car shop,old peoples home,Recreation Ground and a lot of shops.There are two works.There are also 12 cottages by the Recreation Ground.{Upton Crescent}has 216 houses altogether.Upton Crescent was built by a man called{Mr Underhill}in 1973.In Upton Crescent there are 2 bus stops,a telephone box and a letter box. The houses either back on to a bank of lovely wild flowers and then on to the Romsey Golf Course or very large fieids.One house had to be knocked down to make room for the motorway.
